entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Sicamous. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Sicamous. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
